Title: S-adenosyl-L-methionine for people with alcoholic liver disease
Abstract: © 2015 The Cochrane Collaboration.This is the protocol for a review and there is no abstract. The objectives are as follows: To assess the benefits and harms of SAMe in people with alcoholic liver disease.
